pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sparse and Regularized Discriminant Analysis // A collection of sparse and regularized discriminant analysis methods intended for small-sample, high-dimensional data sets. The package features the High-Dimensional Regularized Discriminant Analysis classifier from Ramey et al. (2017) arXiv:1602.01182. Other classifiers include those from Dudoit et al. (2002) doi:10.1198/016214502753479248, Pang et al. (2009) doi:10.1111/j.1541-0420.2009.01200.x, and Tong et al. (2012) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btr690.
